mapper.insert: insert into ${table_prefix}players (player_name, player_uuid, first_login_time, last_login_off_time, total_online_time, name_prefix, name_suffix) values (#{serverPlayer.playerName}, #{serverPlayer.playerUUID}, #{serverPlayer.firstLoginTime}, #{serverPlayer.lastLoginOffTime}, #{serverPlayer.totalOnlineTime}, #{serverPlayer.namePrefix}, #{serverPlayer.nameSuffix})
mapper.update: update ${table_prefix}players set firstLoginTime = #{serverPlayer.firstLoginTime}, lastLoginTime = #{serverPlayer.lastLoginOffTime}, totalOnlineTime = #{serverPlayer.totalOnlineTime}, namePrefix = #{serverPlayer.namePrefix}, nameSuffix = #{serverPlayer.nameSuffix} where playerUUID = #{serverPlayer.playerUUID}
mapper.select: select id, player_name, player_uuid, first_login_time, last_login_off_time, total_online_time, name_prefix, name_suffix from ari_players where player_uuid = #{playerUUID}
